text: (ai rasool) tum kah do ki agar tum log mere deen ke baare mein shaq mein pade ho to (main bhee tumase saaph kahen deta hoon) khuda ke siva tum bhee jin logon kee parasatish karate ho mai to unakee parasatish nahin karane ka magar (haan) mai us khuda kee ibaadat karata hoon jo tumhen (apanee kudarat se duniya se) utha lega aur mujhe to ye hukm diya gaya hai ki momin hoon
